items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football: Irish VS Boise State Broncos
items.summary: It’s playoff football for Notre Dame from now until they lose. It actually started two weeks ago against Purdue, and followed them to Fayettville versus the Arkansas Razorbacks. The Irish passed those tests by a combined score of 112-43. The next hurdle for Notre Dame is the Boise State Broncos. Ideally the Irish could have […]

items.title: Notre Dame head coach Marcus Freeman isn’t having fun
items.summary: On Monday, Notre Dame Football head coach Marcus Freeman, got in front of the media for his weekly press conference. After two blowout wins in a row after the 0-2 start, the Irish look a little different. Most of that difference is on the defensive side of the ball — especially with Adon Shuler and […]

items.title: OPENING ODDS: Notre Dame opens as a MASSIVE favorite over Boise State
items.summary: Notre Dame did exactly what it needed to do last week against the Arkansas Razorbacks. The 56-13 win in Fayettville not only showcased an efficient Irish offense, but an improved defense. Obviously, everything moving forward for the Irish will be under the college football playoff microscope. Notre Dame likely won’t have any ranked win even […]

items.title: How Notre Dame’s opponents fared in week 5 of the college football season
items.summary: Notre Dame got off to a rough start in 2025, but they looked like they fixed a few things in a 56-30 win over the Purdue Boilermakers and then the 56-13 win on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. Sitting at 2-2 and ranked #21 in the AP Top 25, the Irish have a lot […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Stats: 2025-26 Week 5 Review
items.summary: Notre Dame football decided to put up video game numbers against Arkansas in Week 5 of the 2025-26 season.  The final score was 56-13 in favor of the Irish and we’re getting to see this year’s team really come into form.  I never felt confident saying what this team would look like going, especially not […]
